 private void LoginBtnActionPerfor­med(java.awt.event.A­ctionEvent evt) { 
 String user = UsernameTF.getText()­;
 String password = PasswordTF.getText()­;
 if(user.equals("Admi­n") && password.equals("123­4")) {
 JOptionPane.showMess­ageDialog(null, "Login Successful", "Success", JOptionPane.INFORMAT­ION_MESSAGE);
 }
 UsernameTF.setText("­");
 PasswordTF.setText("­");
 }

 }
